ack.p: The authors thank Antonia Wargel, Sandra Damm and Frank Bernhard Kraus for providing data. We further thank Anne-Lisa Mitter for help in the lab and Sarah Rolfes, Nils Krause and Felix David for fieldwork support. We are grateful to Axel Wolff, Conservateur de la RNN des Coussouls de Crau for permits and information, Gisella Caccone for hosting RH at Yale University and Bernd Schierwater for valuable comments. For financial support we appreciate a PROMOS scholarship by the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) given to RH and the Schierwater lab.
